mapper.insert: insert into DATASOURCE (DATASOURCEID, DATASOURCENAME, CLASSID, KIND, CONFIG) values (#{datasourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datasourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{config,jdbcType=CLOB})
mapper.select: select DATASOURCEID, DATASOURCENAME, CLASSID, KIND, CONFIG from DATASOURCE
select DATASOURCEID as "datasourceId", DATASOURCENAME as "datasourceName" from DATASOURCE WHERE CLASSID = #{0} and KIND = 'syn'
